subject: Order stuck at "confirmed"
description_text:
Hello,

I don't want to be that annoying customer, but I have a question regarding
my order (#SSN5896), which I placed on January 8th.

The order status is still showing as “confirmed.” I noticed on your website
that the processing time is listed as 1–2 days, so I wanted to check
whether this delay is expected or if there might be an issue with the order
status.

Thank you very much for your time, I look forward to your response.

Kind regards,
Stijn Haitsma

conversations.body_text: Hi Stijn Haitsma,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
